articles.title: Historic NASA asteroid mission set for perilous return - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA's OSIRIS-REx mission is set to conclude on Sunday as it descends into the Utah desert with an asteroid sample. The mission aims to provide a better understanding of the solar system's formation and Earth's habitability.
articles.content:
NASA's first mission to retrieve an asteroid sample and return it to US soil is expected to reach a perilous finale on Sunday with a descent into the Utah desert.
